title: Uber teams up with Google’s Waymo on self-driving cars
description: Google sister company Waymo signed a deal with Uber to bring its self-driving cars to the app, a major development in the slow march towards robotaxis.

title: Richard Branson’s Virgin Orbit sells assets, shuts down
description: The company's plan to send satellites to space from rockets launched from a 747 drew interest from the Pentagon.

title: A guide to teens, smartphones and social media settings
description: Children are getting smartphones younger than ever. We'll go over what age is appropriate, how to use parental controls, and everything else you need to know.

title: Google and Apple are smartphone dictators. That can be good for you.
description: Google or Apple software runs nearly every smartphone in the world. Here's a wish list of how the smartphone dictators can use their power to your benefit.

title: Meta keeps cutting jobs. Some warn misinformation could surge.
description: A half-dozen current and former Meta employees told The Washington Post that they worry new layoffs this week could endanger content moderation.

title: You can now edit that regrettable WhatsApp message — with one caveat
description: WhatsApp will allow users to edit their messages within 15 minutes of sending them. The feature will be available globally in the next few weeks.
